items.title: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) Expands Life Sciences Cloud With Takeda Partnership
items.description: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) announced a significant partnership with Takeda, selecting its Life Sciences Cloud for customer engagement, which, combined with an expanded partnership with Informatica, underscores its strategic focus on enhancing AI-driven solutions in the healthcare sector. This aligns with client announcements and integrations initiated within the same month. Over the past month, Salesforce's shares moved 16% amid these developments, during which the broader market saw a modest...

items.title: SALESFORCE : UBS reiterates its Neutral rating
items.description: UBS confirms his opinion on the stock and remains Neutral. The target price is lowered from USD 340 to USD 320.
